resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the common way to play the hole. Get as far out as possible. It's very important to get beyond the trees to have a clear second shot into the green. The more the trees come into play, the more curl you'll need to use on your second shot. If you have a left to right wind, make sure to not use max right spin on your approach otherwise you'll risk falling down the right slope and leave yourself with a very difficult chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 310 854 C 176 512 176 512 149 237" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 149 237 L 341 119" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="854" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="237" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="119" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 330 909 C 176 512 176 512 149 237" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 149 237 L 341 119" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="330" cy="909" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="237" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="119" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 350 967 C 176 512 176 512 149 237" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 149 237 L 341 119" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="350" cy="967" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="237" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="119" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: A very aggresive way to play the hole that REQUIRES tailwind and a driver with a lot of topspin. You'll need at least 14mph in tailwind and 6-7 of topspin on your driver. Bounce your shot in the rough on the far side of the lake to place yourself for a short chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 310 854 L 331 254" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 331 254 L 341 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="854" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="331" cy="254" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 330 909 L 331 254" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 331 254 L 341 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="330" cy="909" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="331" cy="254" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="341" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Tour 9 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 1 O'clock
Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 3 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tricky par 3. This approach is the most common way to play the hole. You need both curl and sidespin to pull this one off. With driver use 2 bars of backspin and with a wood use 0.5 bars.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 226 736 C 160 466 160 466 217 316" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 316 L 249 211" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="736" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="316" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="249" cy="211" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 222 817 C 160 466 160 466 217 316" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 316 L 249 211" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="222" cy="817" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="316" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="249" cy="211" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 219 898 C 160 466 160 466 217 316" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 217 316 L 249 211" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="219" cy="898" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="217" cy="316" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="249" cy="211" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is probably the easiest way get a hole in one, and is probably the best way to play the hole with a left to right wind. Use a couple bars of right sidespin and 2 bars of backspin with a driver. With a wood, use topspin instead.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 226 736 C 306 476 306 476 285 315" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 285 315 L 279 210" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="736" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="315" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="279" cy="210" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 222 817 C 306 476 306 476 285 315" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 285 315 L 279 210" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="222" cy="817" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="315" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="279" cy="210" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 219 898 C 306 476 306 476 285 315" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 285 315 L 279 210" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="219" cy="898" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="285" cy="315" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="279" cy="210" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This is an option with a driver with at least 70 in backspin. You can land directly on the green and take the bunkers out of play. With tailwind, you'll want a driver with at least 80 in backspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 226 736 L 259 245" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="226" cy="736" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="259" cy="245" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 222 817 L 259 245" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="222" cy="817" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="259" cy="245" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 219 898 L 259 245" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="219" cy="898" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="259" cy="245" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Tour 11 - Tips for an Easy Pitch

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole. The fairway slopes down to the right so be sure to stay away from the rough and bunker. Be sure to have a wood with a lot of curl. Use full backspin, left sidewind and left curl. This is one of the most difficult second shots in the game so don't get discouraged if you miss it.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 L 156 293" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 156 293 C 233 199 233 199 209 93" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="293" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="93" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 206 901 L 156 293" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 156 293 C 233 199 233 199 209 93" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="206" cy="901" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="293" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="93" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 209 959 L 156 293" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 156 293 C 233 199 233 199 209 93" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="959" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="156" cy="293" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="93" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With a left to right tail wind this is an option. Use a good amount of right curl and right sidespin along with max topspin. That will leave you with an "easy" wood shot into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 206 901 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="206" cy="901" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 209 959 C 199 593 199 593 264 448" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 448 L 329 299" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 329 299 L 219 85" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="209" cy="959" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="448" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="329" cy="299" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="219" cy="85" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: The tee shot is the same as the black path but with a left to right wind, it may not be possible to get the needed curl for the second shot shown in the black path. Here, you use 5-7 bars of topspin with max right sidespin and use the rough patch between the bunkers to get the ball up onto the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 844 L 145 293" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 293 L 194 85" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="844" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="293" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="194" cy="85" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 206 901 L 145 293" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 293 L 194 85" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="206" cy="901" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="293" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="194" cy="85" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 209 959 L 145 293" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 145 293 L 194 85" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="209" cy="959" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="145" cy="293" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="194" cy="85" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole. Lay up as close to the rough on the left as possible. From there, you'll need a wood with good accuracy and ball guide. It's important to keep your second shot out of the rough and bunkers. That will leave you with an easy approach to the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 371 843 L 178 520" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 178 520 C 195 398 195 398 270 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 270 313 L 348 151" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="371" cy="843" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="520" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="270" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="348" cy="151" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 373 885 L 178 520" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 178 520 C 195 398 195 398 270 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 270 313 L 348 151" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="373" cy="885" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="520" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="270" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="348" cy="151" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 374 931 L 178 520" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 178 520 C 195 398 195 398 270 313" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 270 313 L 348 151" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="374" cy="931" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="178" cy="520" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="270" cy="313" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="348" cy="151" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With a tailwind you can go ALL IN. Carry the bunker with your drive and leave your ball close to the 2nd black mark. From there, or even shorter, you can get to the green in two. You'll need a wood with good distance to reach.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 371 843 L 279 545" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 279 545 L 235 405" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 235 405 C 263 300 263 300 352 198" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 352 198 L 360 151" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="371" cy="843" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="279" cy="545" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="235" cy="405" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="352" cy="198" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="360" cy="151" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 373 885 L 279 545" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 279 545 L 235 405" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 235 405 C 263 300 263 300 352 198" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 352 198 L 360 151" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="373" cy="885" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="279" cy="545" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="235" cy="405" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="352" cy="198" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="360" cy="151" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 374 931 L 279 545" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 279 545 L 235 405" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 235 405 C 263 300 263 300 352 198" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 352 198 L 360 151" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="374" cy="931" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="279" cy="545" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="235" cy="405" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="352" cy="198" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="360" cy="151" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

guides.name: Blue/Orange Path
guides.text: This is a somewhat less common route. Play your drive up as close to the rough on the right as possible. From there, depending on the wind, you can choose to either continue up the right fairway or cross over the water. If you opt to go right, you'll need a wood with a lot of distance as the shot is LOOONG.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 371 843 L 495 459" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 495 459 C 533 365 533 365 505 295" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 495 459 L 372 235" stroke="orange" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 505 295 L 375 150" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="371" cy="843" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="495" cy="459" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="505" cy="295" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="372" cy="235" r="6" fill="orange" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="375" cy="150" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Tour 9 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 5 O'clock
Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 4 O'clock
Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 4 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: There's really only one way to play this hole, going up through the narrow fairway. Use 2 bars of backspin with the driver and no bars using your wood. Use up to 5 bars of right side spin depending on what ball you're using. You want the ball to roll to the back of the green and fall back toward the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 176 483 C 142 267 142 267 162 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="483" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="162" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 167 542 C 142 267 142 267 162 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="167" cy="542" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="162" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 159 603 C 142 267 142 267 162 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="159" cy="603" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="162" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

holes.description: BEWARE! The green slopes severely right to left so keep your approach shot to the right!

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Tour 11 Shootout - Tips to Getting Eagle Pitch

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a tough hole. With headwind or sidewind going left is the best way to go. Use full topspin and some left sidespin with your drive. You want to get as close to the rough as possible but NOT in it. That will leave you with a wood into the green. You'll need a wood with plenty of distance.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 392 860 L 220 369" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 220 369 L 429 144" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="392" cy="860" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="369" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="429" cy="144" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 405 908 L 220 369" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 220 369 L 429 144" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="405" cy="908" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="369" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="429" cy="144" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 417 957 L 220 369" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 220 369 L 429 144" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="417" cy="957" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="369" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="429" cy="144" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Only play this path with tailwind and you can go directly over the creek. Use max topspin to get as far up the fairway as possible. That will likely leave you with a short iron for your second shot.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 392 860 L 414 428" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 414 428 L 452 155" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="392" cy="860" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="414" cy="428" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="452" cy="155" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 405 908 L 414 428" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 414 428 L 452 155" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="405" cy="908" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="414" cy="428" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="452" cy="155" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 417 957 L 414 428" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 414 428 L 452 155" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="417" cy="957" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="414" cy="428" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="452" cy="155" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This is a riskier route where you aim between the bunkers and use a good amount of topspin to get over to the next fairway. You'll need at least 5 bars of topspin to pull it off. You'll have a short or long iron into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 392 860 L 340 485" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 340 485 L 323 288" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 323 288 L 441 150" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="392" cy="860" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="340" cy="485" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="323" cy="288" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="441" cy="150" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 405 908 L 340 485" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 340 485 L 323 288" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 323 288 L 441 150" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="405" cy="908" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="340" cy="485" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="323" cy="288" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="441" cy="150" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 417 957 L 340 485" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 340 485 L 323 288" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 323 288 L 441 150" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="417" cy="957" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="340" cy="485" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="323" cy="288" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="441" cy="150" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tough par 5 to get an eagle on. If you DON'T have tailwind play the black path. Bounce your drive over the sliver of rough to the small fairway on the left. From there, depending on the wind, you can either bounce on the next small fairway to the last fairway or use a lot of backspin to hold your second shot on that small fairway. That will leave you with a difficult approach into the green. It's important to just keep your ball on the green. Avoid using too much backspin or you may end up in the front greenside bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 308 940 L 191 613" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 613 L 131 484" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 131 484 L 181 286" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 181 286 L 248 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="308" cy="940" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="613" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="131" cy="484" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="286" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="248" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 310 978 L 191 613" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 613 L 131 484" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 131 484 L 181 286" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 181 286 L 248 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="310" cy="978" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="613" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="131" cy="484" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="286" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="248" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 312 1016 L 191 613" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 191 613 L 131 484" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 131 484 L 181 286" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <path d="M 181 286 L 248 87" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="312" cy="1016" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="191" cy="613" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="131" cy="484" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="286" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" /> <circle cx="248" cy="87" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="4" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind, go ALL IN and get as far down the fairway as possible. Use the driver with the most distance. For the second shot, you'll need a wood with a lot of distance to make the green in two. You can go left or right with the second shot and let the ball roll down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 308 940 L 287 468" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 287 468 L 284 326" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 284 326 C 232 205 232 205 252 91" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="308" cy="940" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="287" cy="468" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="284" cy="326" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="252" cy="91" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 310 978 L 287 468" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 287 468 L 284 326" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 284 326 C 232 205 232 205 252 91" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="310" cy="978" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="287" cy="468" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="284" cy="326" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="252" cy="91" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 312 1016 L 287 468" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 287 468 L 284 326" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 284 326 C 232 205 232 205 252 91" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="312" cy="1016" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="287" cy="468" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="284" cy="326" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="252" cy="91" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Southern Pine 9 Hole Cup - Pro / Expert
Tour 11 Shootout - Hard Left to Right Wind Tips
Tour 11 Shootout - Right to Left Wind
Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 9 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the path to take with headwind or if you're using a driver without a lot of curl. Use 1-2 bars of topspin and max left sidespin. Bounce over the rough and your ball should feed right down towards the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 383 818 C 445 527 445 527 450 328" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="383" cy="818" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="450" cy="328" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 380 901 C 445 527 445 527 450 328" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="380" cy="901" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="450" cy="328" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 378 987 C 445 527 445 527 450 328" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="378" cy="987" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="450" cy="328" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With sidewind or tailwind this is the best way to play the hole. Use 4+ backspin along with max left sidespin. With straight tailwind, use about 50% left curl and with a right to left wind you still should not use max curl.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 383 818 C 501 503 501 503 460 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="383" cy="818" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="460" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 380 901 C 501 503 501 503 460 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="380" cy="901" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="460" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 378 987 C 501 503 501 503 460 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="378" cy="987" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="460" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This may be a better option when you get a wind from left to right. Use max right sidespin with 1 - 3 bars of backspin. Bounce over the water and down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 383 818 C 258 485 258 485 307 295" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="383" cy="818" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="307" cy="295" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 380 901 C 258 485 258 485 307 295" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="380" cy="901" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="307" cy="295" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 378 987 C 258 485 258 485 307 295" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="378" cy="987" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="307" cy="295" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: This is generally only an option in the Rookie division where winds are low. Place your first bounce on the island and let the ball run out towards the pin. Keep in mind that the bounce on the island is inconsistent and unreliable.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 383 818 L 388 303" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="383" cy="818" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="388" cy="303" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 380 901 L 388 303" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="380" cy="901" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="388" cy="303" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 378 987 L 388 303" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="378" cy="987" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="388" cy="303" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />
